meanings.definition: The state or quality of being less potent or powerful.
meanings.sent1: The subpotencies of the medicine made it less effective.
meanings.sent2: The subpotencies of the battery caused it to run out quickly.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's subpotencies made him the least powerful in the group.
meanings.sent4: Her subpotencies in the game were like having a weak weapon in a battle.
meanings.sent5: The subpotencies of the old car engine made it struggle to start.

meanings.definition: A lower level of potency or strength.
meanings.sent1: The subpotencies of the coffee left it tasting weak.
meanings.sent2: He felt the subpotencies of his muscles after a long day of work.
meanings.sent3: The subpotencies of the kitten's meow made it sound adorable.
meanings.sent4: The subpotencies of the candle flame flickered in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The subpotencies of the flashlight made it dim in the dark room.
